system.description: This spell functions like shout, except that the cone is 60 feet long and the damage is 10d6 points of sonic damage (or 1d6 per caster level, max 20d6, against brittle or crystalline objects). Creatures that fail their save are stunned for 1 round and deafened for 4d6 rounds. A successful Fortitude save negates the stunning and halves both the damage and the duration of the deafness.

components.materialDescription: A feather or a small bone (as for shout).

system.savingThrow: Fortitude partial or Reflex half; see text
